original_text: So, friends, please choose seven men from among you. You must know that each of them is full of the Holy Spirit. They must also be very wise. We will ask these seven men to do this work for us.
korean_text: 형제들아 너희 가운데서 성령과 지혜가 충만하여 칭찬 받는 사람 일곱을 택하라 우리가 이 일을 그들에게 맡기고

sentences.original_text: So, friends, please choose seven men
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로, 친구들, 일곱 명을 선택해 주세요

sentences.original_text: You must know that each of them
is full of the Holy Spirit.
sentences.korean_translation: 성령으로 가득 차 있다는 것을 알아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They must also be very wise.
We will ask these seven men
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 이 일곱 명에게 요청할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to do this work for us.
